description:
The 12th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet which, by 796 UC, was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch778 [Borodin].
In 796 UC, it took part in the attempted invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire]. The fleet suffered very heavy losses against Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch189 [Cornelius Lutz] during the Battle of Bolthorn, with Borodin committing suicide at the end of the engagement. The surviving ships surrendered to the Imperial Fleet.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Dai 12 Kantai
